name: Neuron Syndicate
description:
At Neuron, we are committed to creating breakthrough brand solutions. With an entrepreneurial spirit, we fuse emotion and experience to build a collaborative bond of trust between our clients and their consumers. Our goal is to infuse meaning, clarity and purpose into ideas and messages. We’re here to ensure your brand’s promise is achieved.
Just as the human body uses neurons to transmit messages from the brain to the physical senses, Neuron Syndicate is committed to delivering thought-provoking creative solutions. We seek to entice and arouse the senses of our clients audience to clearly deliver their organization’s desired message and fulfill all their creative needs. Our overall goal is to trigger an emotional and intellectual lasting response through intriguing, innovative and unparalleled concepts and design.
